properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Stonington, ME to Port Clyde, ME out 25 NM; Coastal Waters from Port Clyde, ME to Cape Elizabeth, ME out 25 NM
properties.headline: Heavy Freezing Spray Advisory issued February 13 at 5:39PM EST until February 15 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, seas 3 to 6 feet expected
with gusts to 25 kt. For the Freezing Spray Advisory, light
accumulation of freezing spray expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Port Clyde, ME to Stonington, ME
out to 25 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 PM EST Friday.
For the Freezing Spray Advisory, from 7 PM Friday to 4 AM EST
Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in freezing spray is hazardous.
Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic components
inoperative. Ice accretion on decks and superstructures may
result in some loss of stability. Conditions will be hazardous
to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for accumulation of ice on their vessel
and consider altering plans to avoid or mitigate these hazardous
navigating conditions.

Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST FRIDAY... ...FREEZING SPRAY ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM FRIDAY TO 4 AM EST SATURDAY
